desc: Take the eXit and get outdoors! Whether your "out" is the slopes, street, surf, trail or park, we've got you covered. From skateboards to snowboards, backpacking gear to bikes, we carry some of the top brands to get you geared up for your next adventure. All you have to do is take the eXit and get outside.

layout.text: your going to flip on our selection and prices!
